Real estate listings held by brokerage firms other than Zillow, Inc. are marked with the RMLS™ logo, and detailed information about these properties includes the names of the listing brokers. The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: Welcome to your forever home on a quiet cul-de-sac in the coveted Persimmon Golf Course Community! Sunlight-soaked 4 bedroom / 3 full bathroom with views of Mt. Hood on both levels. The interior is spacious featuring a large office, formal living and dining room along with a great room that seamlessly combines the kitchen and family area. Step out onto the patio from the kitchen's eating nook for an indoor-outdoor BBQ with pals. Upstairs, you'll find a second family/media room and four bedrooms, including a generously sized primary suite with a walk-in closet. Outside enjoy the low maintenance turf yard, nice landscaping and water feature. Peace of mind provided by a back-up generator. Enough room for everyone to work and play!
